import e from "cors"; import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import './RegStyles.css' function RegServicePage() { const [service, setService] = useState({ detalle: "", valor: 0, estado: "Inactivo" }) const handleChange = e => { setService({ ...service, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = () => { if (service.detalle == '' || service.valor == '' || service.estado == '') { alert('Todos los campos deben estar rellenados') return } } const requestInit = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(service) } fetch('http://localhost:3001/add-service', requestInit) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => console.log(res)) setService({ detalle: "", valor: 0, estado: "Inactivo" }) return (

GESTIÃ“N DE SERVICIOS

Registro de Servicios
) } export default RegServicePage;
